10001000.name: In the Wilderness
10001000.description: The development area is teeming with buildings. Get closer, and you might find a familiar face.

10001010.name: Reunion
10001010.description: Is that O'Brien hard at work over there? Go say hi to her.

10001020.name: John's Repair Plan
10001020.description: O'Brien says that the route to the harbor has been destroyed. Discuss repairs with John.

10001030.name: Pickaxes and Coal
10001030.description: Help John gather enough Coal for the repairs.

10001040.name: Hatches and Wood
10001040.description: Help O'Brien gather enough Raw Timber for the repairs.

10001050.name: Teamwork on the Plains
10001050.description: Help John and O'Brien repair the damaged transit connection.

10001060.name: Off Into the Distance
10001060.description: The bus is back in service. Time to check out the harbor.

10001070.name: Gifts from the Plains
10001070.description: Take a look around the harbor. Patrick should be nearby.

10001071.name: Gifts from the Plains
10001071.description: Take a look around the harbor. Patrick should be nearby.

10001080.name: Looking for Traces in the Harbor
10001080.description: Akashi likes to hang around Café Manjuu. Go have a look.

10001090.name: The Mysterious Café Manjuu
10001090.description: What secret is Akashi hiding now? Hurry through the door and nab that feline.

10001100.name: Surrounded by Alarms
10001100.description: The café is chock full of alarms. Carefully avoid their detection and don't let Akashi notice you.

targets.text: Evade the security system as you pursue Akashi.

10001110.name: The Missing Green Cat
10001110.description: Akashi is gone. Where did she go?

10001120.name: A Secret Base?
10001120.description: Confront Akashi and get to the bottom of this.

10001130.name: Rights Secured
10001130.description: Akashi finally spilled the beans. You're finally about to gain control over the development! However...

10001140.name: Island Tech
10001140.description: Use Akashi's technology as a base to develop your first Island Authority Permit.

10001141.name: Island Tech
10001141.description: Use Akashi's technology as a base to develop your first Island Authority Permit.

10001150.name: Island Authorization Device
10001150.description: Invite your friends from port with the Island Authorization Device. The island's future rides on everyone's help!

10001151.name: Island Authorization Device
10001151.description: Invite your friends from port with the Island Authorization Device. The island's future rides on everyone's help!

10001160.name: Saratoga's Arrival
10001160.description: Saratoga is here to help! Go greet her at the harbor.

10001170.name: Island EXP Textbook
10001170.description: Akashi has offered you the Island EXP Textbook, containing six months of her experience. Do what she wants, and it's yours.

10001180.name: Raise the Island Development Level
10001180.description: Tasks and errands pop up daily on this island! Raise that development level!

10002010.name: All Business Is Good Business
10002010.description: In this debt crisis, who can offer you guidance? Patrick, of course - as if she isn't busy enough already!

10002020.name: Tales of Treasure
10002020.description: They say Stephen should know about the treasure. Try asking her.

10002030.name: Trailing Stephen
10002030.description: Greatship Pier is deserted. Is this the curse of Treasure Island, or something far more sinister?

10002031.name: Trailing Stephen
10002031.description: Greatship Pier is deserted. Is this the curse of Treasure Island, or something far more sinister?

10002032.name: Trailing Stephen
10002032.description: Greatship Pier is deserted. Is this the curse of Treasure Island, or something far more sinister?

10002040.name: Work-Life Balance
10002040.description: Can work-life balance save the day in the most dire of crises?

10002050.name: What's the Point of Hard Work?
10002050.description: What's the point of hard work? To strike it rich, of course!

10002051.name: Raise the Island Development Level
10002051.description: Tasks and errands pop up daily on this island! Raise that development level!

10002060.name: Morningdew Farm
10002060.description: Take the bus from the harbor to Morningdew Farm.

10002070.name: The Farm Girl
10002070.description: Making wheat grow takes more than just perseverance.

10002080.name: Growing Crops
10002080.description: Buy wheat seeds at the Shop and try planting them.

targets.text: Buy wheat seeds at the Shop.

10002081.name: Growing Crops
10002081.description: Buy wheat seeds at the Shop and try planting them.

10002090.name: The Ranch's Treasure
10002090.description: The key to making money in farming is a good ranch. Uncover the hidden treasure within.

10002100.name: On the Hunt!
10002100.description: Help Amerigo find the clucky clucky bird.

10002110.name: Feed for Clucky
10002110.description: Clucky's all out of feed. Go to the mill to make some for Amerigo.

10002120.name: Producing Feed
10002120.description: Grind wheat to make feed with Olympic.

10002130.name: Gift From the Animals
10002130.description: Check on the animal products with Amerigo.

10002131.name: Gift From the Animals
10002131.description: Check on the animal products with Amerigo.

10002140.name: Daily Progress
10002140.description: Amerigo has suddenly disappeared. Go see if she's already with Homeric.

10002141.name: Raise the Island Development Level
10002141.description: Tasks and errands pop up daily on this island! Raise that development level!

10002150.name: Break Time
10002150.description: Time to treat yourself. Go pay Café Manjuu a visit.

10002170.name: A Delicious Omelette!
10002170.description: Give Bremen eggs so she can make an omelette.

10002180.name: Harbor Delivery
10002180.description: Deliver a tasty omelette to Stephen.

10002190.name: Deliciousness for Sale
10002190.description: A new source of funds, and tasty food for everyone.

targets.text: Talk to Bremen about Stephen's proposal.

10002200.name: Customer Number One
10002200.description: Add omelettes to the menu and wait for your first customer.

targets.text: Buy omelettes and add them to the lineup.

10002210.name: Akashi's Exclusive Deals
10002210.description: An exclusive deal? Is this just a sales pitch, or is there more to it? Visit Akashi's shop to figure it out for yourself.

10002211.name: Raise the Island Development Level
10002211.description: Tasks and errands pop up daily on this island! Raise that development level!

10002220.name: Treasure Island?
10002220.description: Akashi wants to tell you something. Go meet up with her.

10002230.name: Aircraft Restoration - Harbor
10002230.description: For the sake of treasure and an intact means of transportation, gather the aircraft debris at the harbor.

10002240.name: Aircraft Restoration - Windswept Plains
10002240.description: For the sake of treasure and an intact means of transportation, gather the aircraft debris at the Windswept Plains.

10002250.name: Aircraft Restoration - Morningdew Farm
10002250.description: For the sake of treasure and an intact means of transportation, gather the aircraft debris at Morningdew Farm.

10002251.name: Aircraft Restoration - Morningdew Farm
10002251.description: For the sake of treasure and an intact means of transportation, gather the aircraft debris at Morningdew Farm.

10002260.name: Make for Blue Skies
10002260.description: Go to the pier, talk to Akashi, and prepare for departure.

10002270.name: Off to Treasure Island!
10002270.description: Your ride is ready. It's time to get on Akashi's aircraft and go to Treasure Island!

10002271.name: Off to Treasure Island!
10002271.description: Your ride is ready. It's time to get on Akashi's aircraft and go to Treasure Island!

10002280.name: So-Called Treasure
10002280.description: Follow Mary on a tour of the treasures on the island.

10002290.name: Daily Supply
10002290.description: Use the device to send an airdrop signal.

10002300.name: My Own Romantic Getaway
10002300.description: A relaxing, leisurely vacation... This isn't so bad after all - except for the ever-present shadow of debt!

10002310.name: The Treasure of Get-Together Island
10002310.description: Treasure Island? More like Get-Together Island! Make this place a treasure for everyone to share!

targets.text: Place the Beary Nice Bus Stop.

10002320.name: Get-Together Island at Its Best
10002320.description: Find the perfect angle to shoot your vision of Get-Together Island!

targets.text: Take a picture of Get-Together Island.

10002330.name: Animal Neighbors
10002330.description: Don't forget about your adorable little neighbors! Take a commemorative photo with them!

targets.text: Take a picture of an animal on Get-Together Island.

10002340.name: Aircraft Upgrade
10002340.description: Elizabeth says there's an expert who can upgrade your aircraft, but you'll have to procure the parts yourself.

10002350.name: The Mysterious Expert
10002350.description: Mary's professional help has arrived! Go to the harbor to welcome her!

10002360.name: The Wonder of Get-Together Island
10002360.description: Try out your upgraded aircraft and experience the wonders of Get-Together Island!

10002370.name: A Bright Future
10002370.description: Go back to the harbor and see if there's anything new.

targets.text: Get Patrick's status report on the development.

10002380.name: Raise the Island Development Level
10002380.description: Tasks and errands pop up daily on this island! Raise that development level!

10003010.name: Life in the Development
10003010.description: Patrick has been looking for you. You'd better see what she needs!

10003011.name: Life in the Development
10003011.description: Patrick has been looking for you. You'd better see what she needs!

10003020.name: Building the Commercial Area
10003020.description: You're just beginning to tap the true potential of the development!

10003030.name: Foods of the Commercial Area
10003030.description: You can't let Am-Mer-Mar give up now. Help her get the job done!

10003040.name: Commerce Revitalized
10003040.description: The survival of the commercial are hinges on how you manage the shops!

targets.text: Manage a shop in the commercial district.

10003050.name: To the Prosperous Plantation
10003050.description: Go to Prosperous Plantation to help bolster the variety of foods you sell.

10003051.name: To the Prosperous Plantation
10003051.description: Go to Prosperous Plantation to help bolster the variety of foods you sell.

10003060.name: The Quest for Honey
10003060.description: Find some bees to pollinate your trees for faster fruits!

10003070.name: Honeybees and Bee Honey
10003070.description: Your new bee friends are practically buzzing from nervousness. Gather some Fresh Honey to help them settle in.

10003080.name: Apple Trees
10003080.description: Pollination's all taken care of. Now it's finally time to plant those apple saplings.

10003090.name: Heaps of Apples
10003090.description: You planted apple saplings! Watch them grow big and strong, with lots of tasty fruit.

10003091.name: Heaps of Apples
10003091.description: You planted apple saplings! Watch them grow big and strong, with lots of tasty fruit.

10003100.name: Building a Plant Nursery
10003100.description: Laconia wants to help, too. Does this fertile soil have more surprises to be found?!

10003110.name: Raise the Island Development Level
10003110.description: Tasks and errands pop up daily on this island! Raise that development level!

10004010.name: One Suspicious Feline
10004010.description: Akashi has been hard at work on something lately. Ask her if she's made any new discoveries!

10004020.name: The Industrial Revolution
10004020.description: We'll need industry to make this island prosper! Help Akashi gather materials to put her plan into action!

10004030.name: Island Factory
10004030.description: An underground factory? On YOUR island?! Go see Akashi's secret factory!

10019999.name: Prosperity and Debt
10019999.description: Along with the rights to the island, Akashi also transferred a huge debt to you that she deliberately kept secret.

20001001.name: Sounds in the Woods
20001001.description: Howls have been heard near the woods, and O'Brien is terrified.

targets.text: Find the source of the howls.

20001002.name: Efficiency Means Victory
20001002.description: Efficiency means victory! The trick to logging like a pro is a focused mind!

20001003.name: Efficiency Means Victory
20001003.description: Efficiency means victory! The trick to logging like a pro is a focused mind!

targets.text: Return and share your findings with O'Brien.

20001004.name: Bang! Pow!
20001004.description: You heard a noise off in the distance. What was that?

targets.text: Go to Rockheap Mine and see what happened.

20001005.name: Broken Track
20001005.description: The minecart track broke due to being pushed beyond capacity.

targets.text: Look for Wood suited to make a temporary track.

20001006.name: Makeshift Track
20001006.description: This will do for now. We can think of a long-term solution after the work's done.

targets.text: Look for Workable Wood around the Verdant Woods.

20001007.name: Must Be Done Today
20001007.description: The makeshift track is done, and the minecart is moving again.

20001008.name: The Last Ore
20001008.description: John's progress has been delayed and she won't be able to meet the quota for today... What should you do?!

targets.text: Gather Iron Ore at Rockheap Mine.

20001009.name: Riverside Song
20001009.description: You heard cheerful singing coming from the riverside. Is it someone who's finished their job for the day?

20002001.name: Decorative Painting
20002001.description: You've heard that someone is collecting paintings...

20002002.name: Sketch Subject
20002002.description: How do you capture a moment's inspiration?

20002003.name: Gathering Suggestions
20002003.description: It's good to get loads of other people's ideas.

20002004.name: Making a Brush
20002004.description: A brush is to an artist what a cannon is to a warship!

targets.text: Gather Wool to make a brush with.

20002005.name: Making a Frame
20002005.description: Just as the clothes make the man, the frame makes the painting.

targets.text: Gather Elegant Wood to make a frame with.

20002006.name: Your Reward
20002006.description: A painting brimming with feeling deserves a frame brimming with it as well!

20003001.name: Something's Burned in the Servers
20003001.description: The Island Base's servers seem to have stopped working.

20003002.name: Raw Materials for Repair
20003002.description: The cause of the server downage has been figured out. Go and see Bremen.

20003003.name: Searching for Parts
20003003.description: John is repairing the servers, but something seems to be impeding her progress.

targets.text: Search Greatship Pier for the parts she ordered.

20003004.name: Function Restored!
20003004.description: The servers' power system has been repaired.

targets.text: Install the power system into the servers.

20004001.name: Greetings From the Manager
20004001.description: New dishes are crucially important for the commercial area!

targets.text: Go to Bremen and ask for tips on making new dishes.

20004002.name: Tips for Developing New Recipes
20004002.description: Eating the same thing for a long time gets monotonous. How about developing some new dishes?

20004003.name: The Commercial Area's New Dish
20004003.description: The new dish is ready. Go and give Am-Mer-Mar a surprise.

20005001.name: Ghastly Rumors
20005001.description: They say you can often hear spooky sounds on the farm late at night.

20005002.name: Bells in the Night
20005002.description: There are bells ringing in the middle of the night... but at least it's not coming from the fog.

targets.text: Go to the forest and investigate.

20005003.name: Bells in the Night
20005003.description: There are bells ringing in the middle of the night... but at least it's not coming from the fog.

20005004.name: Another Creepy Noise
20005004.description: As soon as you solve one mystery case, another one crops up!

20005005.name: Who's Banging in the Night?
20005005.description: So you just heard a creepy noise. Well, guess that's something.

targets.text: Go to the toolshed and investigate.

20005006.name: Horned Figure
20005006.description: Things often come in sets of three, and that includes spooky incidents.

20005007.name: Ghostbusting Specialist
20005007.description: Who's behind this whole series of strange occurrences?!

20005008.name: Ghostbusting Specialist
20005008.description: Who's behind this whole series of strange occurrences?!

20005009.name: Ghostbusting Specialist
20005009.description: Who's behind this whole series of strange occurrences?!

20006001.name: The Sheep Are Gone!
20006001.description: Operation: Chase the Sheep is a-go!

targets.text: Follow Amerigo to the place where the sheep like to go.

20006002.name: Closer Examination
20006002.description: Follow the hoofprints and hope you find the sheep.

20006003.name: Closer Examination
20006003.description: Follow the hoofprints and hope you find the sheep.

20006004.name: Found You!
20006004.description: The sheep's hiding in the woods! Bring it back home!

20006005.name: Eyewitness
20006005.description: Locating an eyewitness is the most important part of finding clues!

targets.text: Ask Homeric about where the sheep have gone.

20006006.name: Chased It Down!
20006006.description: You found the herd of sheep. Bring them back home.

targets.text: Head to where the sheep are.

20006007.name: Chased It Down!
20006007.description: You found the herd of sheep. Bring them back home.

20006008.name: Chased It Down!
20006008.description: You found the herd of sheep. Bring them back home.

20006009.name: Reinforcing the Fences
20006009.description: You brought the sheep back home. Now to make sure they don't escape again!

20007001.name: The Person Stuck Behind the Wall
20007001.series: Bees, Honey, and the Nameless Person
20007001.description: Sounds like someone's stuck inside the wall, and wants you to chase away some nearby bees.

targets.text: Get rid of the nearby bee nest.

20007002.name: Removing Bees Around the Harbor
20007002.series: Bees, Honey, and the Nameless Person
20007002.description: Don't forget the bees around the harbor!

targets.text: Get rid of the bee nest around the harbor.

20007003.name: Removing Bees Around the Farm
20007003.series: Bees, Honey, and the Nameless Person
20007003.description: Don't forget the bees around the farm!

targets.text: Get rid of the bee nest around the farm.

20007004.name: Reinvigorating Honey Water
20007004.series: Bees, Honey, and the Nameless Person
20007004.description: A drink that makes you sleep like a baby through the night. Sounds tasty.

targets.text: Ask Bremen about the honey water recipe.

20007005.name: The Best Honey Water in the World
20007005.series: Bees, Honey, and the Nameless Person
20007005.description: Bremen's top-secret honey water recipe is hidden somewhere in the commercial area!

targets.text: Head to the commercial area and find the recipe.

20007006.name: Missing Ingredients!
20007006.series: Bees, Honey, and the Nameless Person
20007006.description: Bremen is missing some ingredients needed to make the honey water. Help her gather them.

20007007.name: Find the Rosemary
20007007.series: Bees, Honey, and the Nameless Person
20007007.description: All that's left is rosemary. Go ask Am-Mer-Mar about it.

20007008.name: Find the Rosemary
20007008.series: Bees, Honey, and the Nameless Person
20007008.description: All that's left is rosemary. Go ask Am-Mer-Mar about it.

targets.text: Look for rosemary at the Golden Koi Restaurant.

20007009.name: Fresh Ingredients
20007009.series: Bees, Honey, and the Nameless Person
20007009.description: The ingredients got the Bremen seal of approval. They're fit to make some good honey water!

targets.text: Go deliver all the ingredients to Bremen.

20007010.name: The Nameless Person
20007010.series: Bees, Honey, and the Nameless Person
20007010.description: The honey water gave the mysterious person a surge of endless confidence. You'll probably meet again someday.

targets.text: Give Honey Water to the nameless person.

20008001.name: Urgent Request
20008001.series: Go to Stephen and scope out the situation.
20008001.description: It seems like Patrick received an urgent request from Stephen. You should go have a look.

targets.text: Go to Stephen and scope out the situation.

20008002.name: Another Problem
20008002.description: The harbor is short of wood. It needs to be replenished immediately!

20008003.name: Risk Management
20008003.description: Some of the coal in the harbor's storehouse has vanished. Gather more and get it to Stephen.

20008004.name: Request Complete
20008004.description: You've completed the urgent request. Go report to Patrick.

targets.text: Go see Patrick and complete the request.

20009001.name: No Details
20009001.description: A mysterious request has ended up in Stephen's hands. She could use a hand.

20009002.name: Transporting Ore
20009002.description: The precious ore needs to be packed up. Go see O'Brien about it.

20009003.name: Akashi's Plan
20009003.description: It was Akashi who made the request to O'Brien. Go see what Akashi is planning.

20009004.name: The Truth Is Out
20009004.description: You've figured out that Akashi's been trying to perform secret research on the ore. Go tell Stephen about it.

20010001.name: A Gift for Patrick
20010001.description: You want to give something to Patrick as thanks for all her hard work. What would make for a good gift?

targets.text: Go and ask Olympic for advice.

20010002.name: Advice
20010002.description: After asking Patrick herself for her thoughts, you've gained something to work with!

20010003.name: The Secret to High Energy!
20010003.description: The secret behind Amerigo's constant high energy is - get this - exercise?!

20010005.name: Find Carrots
20010005.description: The carrot-based energy drink is ready. Well, a trial version of it, anyway. Who'll be the lucky taste-taster?

20010006.name: Comfy Sleep!
20010006.description: What kind of energy drink puts the drinker to sleep? Time for a new recipe!

20010007.name: Sweet Meringue
20010007.description: Let's try to make a new energy drink with sweet meringue!

20010008.name: From Us to You
20010008.description: Pass on everyone's appreciation to Patrick.

targets.text: Bring the energy drink to Patrick.

20011001.name: The Singular Restaurant
20011001.description: It seems Am-Mer-Mar wants to open some new stores in the commercial area. Help her with the survey.

targets.text: Go to Café Manjuu and get some advice from Bremen.

20011002.name: Favorite Foods
20011002.description: Ask around the harbor what everyone's favorite foods are.

20011003.name: Don't Forget Yourself
20011003.description: It's good to think of others, but don't neglect yourself.

20011004.name: Shop Under Construction
20011004.description: New materials are needed to build new stores. It's time to get your gathering gloves on.

20011005.name: A Dining District for Everyone
20011005.description: Help Am-Mer-Mar gather plenty of ingredients for the sake of culinary variety.

20012001.name: Just Borrow Them
20012001.description: Lusitania's pruning shears broke. For now, she'll have to borrow a new pair!

targets.text: Borrow a pair of pruning shears from Homeric.

20012002.name: Buy New Ones Already
20012002.description: You eventually have to return something you borrowed. Might as well take this chance to buy a replacement!

targets.text: Return to Lusitania and give her the item.

20012003.name: Trees Need Fertilizer
20012003.description: Lusitania could use a hand. Start by helping with the fertilizer.

targets.text: Return to Lusitania and give her the item.

20012004.name: Trees Need Fertilizer
20012004.description: Lusitania could use a hand. Start by helping with the fertilizer.

20012005.name: The Joy of Farming (In a Nutshell)
20012005.description: Harvest Citrus Fruit at Lusitania's orchard.

20012006.name: Reciprocation
20012006.description: That citrus coffee Bremen makes... Is it made with the fruit from the orchard?

targets.text: Give the citrus fruits to Bremen.

20012007.name: Checking the Number of Orders
20012007.description: There's some cause for concern over the number of orders. Have a look and see how many there are!

targets.text: Bring the citrus coffee to Lusitania.

20012008.name: A Surprise
20012008.description: So she remembered to order new insect repellent, but forgot to order new tools?

targets.text: Check the number of orders with Patrick.

20012009.name: Bad Bugs Get the Repellent
20012009.description: Take care of the bugs that are harmful to the trees!

targets.text: Bring the insect repellent to Lusitania.

20012010.name: Bad Bugs Get the Repellent
20012010.description: Take care of the bugs that are harmful to the trees!

targets.text: Apply insect repellent to the trees.

20013001.name: Missing Fertilizer
20013001.series: The Lavender Won't Be in Time!
20013001.description: Apparently, the fertilizer Laconia ordered hasn't arrived after all this time. Go see Stephen and ask what the matter is.

20013002.name: Scattered Cargo
20013002.series: The Lavender Won't Be in Time!
20013002.description: Laconia's fertilizer got scattered everywhere. Tell her the bad news.

20013003.name: Place a New Order...
20013003.series: The Lavender Won't Be in Time!
20013003.description: Will it arrive in time if you order some more?

targets.text: Go see Patrick and place a new order.

20013004.name: The Search for Fertilizer...
20013004.series: The Lavender Won't Be in Time!
20013004.description: The only option left is to try your luck at Greatship Pier!

targets.text: Go to Greatship Pier and look for fertilizer.

20013005.name: The Day Is Saved!
20013005.series: The Lavender Won't Be in Time!

20013006.name: Sowing Together
20013006.series: The Lavender Won't Be in Time!
20013006.description: Time is running out! Help Laconia plant her lavenders!

targets.text: Assign a character to plant lavenders in the nursery.

20013007.name: Harvest Time
20013007.series: The Lavender Won't Be in Time!

20013008.name: Lavender Delivery!
20013008.series: The Lavender Won't Be in Time!
20013008.description: Now it's just a race to the finish line!

targets.text: Give the packaged lavenders to Patrick.

20014001.name: The Secret of the Map Pieces
20014001.description: What kind of secret can be pieced together from some paper scraps?

targets.text: Find the lost map fragments around the island - 1
Find the lost map fragments around the island - 2
Find the lost map fragments around the island - 3
Find the lost map fragments around the island - 4
Find the lost map fragments around the island - 5

20014002.name: The Secret of the Map Pieces
20014002.description: What kind of secret can be pieced together from some paper scraps?

targets.text: Go to the place marked on the map and look for treasure.

20014003.name: The Cat's Payback
20014003.description: Supposedly, there's treasure out in the plains. Grab a shovel and get digging!

20015001.name: Let's Get Started!
20015001.description: It's time to develop the island! Peary is putting together a resource plan. Go see her.

targets.text: Obtain an outfit from the seasonal shop.

20015002.name: Great Island Development
20015002.description: It's the season of hard work! Get out there and develop the island!

30000001.name: A Delayed Order
30000001.description: The order's long overdue and we can't delay it any further! Just help me gather some minerals, any will do!

30000002.name: Overgrowing Trees
30000002.description: The trees in the forest are growing out of control... Think you could help me chop some down?

30000003.name: Island Request
30000003.description: Every day, tons of requests come in from all over. But, be mindful to turn down ones that you can't handle.

30000004.name: Research Project
30000004.description: Technological research is a must for the island's growth. Time to advance up the tech tree.

30000005.name: May This Moment Last Forever!
30000005.description: A new day, a new you.

30000006.name: Manjuu Logistics
30000006.description: Cargo distribution has been delayed, and the goods slated to be delivered all over the island are now stuck at the harbor.

30000007.name: Manjuu Logistics
30000007.description: Cargo distribution has been delayed, and the goods slated to be delivered all over the island are now stuck at the harbor.

30000008.name: Everyone Loves Cats
30000008.description: The cats on the island have been looking down lately. Use your magic touch on the cats to cheer them up!

30101001.name: Labor is Glorious
30101001.description: Gather lumber and minerals, and teach John and O'Brien about the joys of labor!

30201001.name: Good Management
30201001.description: See what resources the island is lacking, assign some friends who are up to the task, and produce some stuff!

targets.text: Assign a character to a material production slot.

30301001.name: Transport Job
30301001.description: Today's transport jobs have been carefully curated for you. They're sure to be quite profitable.

30401001.name: Island Request
30401001.description: Every day, tons of requests come in from all over. But, be mindful to turn down ones that you can't handle.

30501001.name: Manjuu Logistics
30501001.description: Cargo distribution has been delayed, and the goods slated to be delivered all over the island are now stuck at the harbor.

30501002.name: Manjuu Logistics
30501002.description: Cargo distribution has been delayed, and the goods slated to be delivered all over the island are now stuck at the harbor.

30501011.name: Manjuu Logistics
30501011.description: Cargo distribution has been delayed, and the goods slated to be delivered all over the island are now stuck at the harbor.

30501012.name: Manjuu Logistics
30501012.description: Cargo distribution has been delayed, and the goods slated to be delivered all over the island are now stuck at the harbor.

30501021.name: Manjuu Logistics
30501021.description: Cargo distribution has been delayed, and the goods slated to be delivered all over the island are now stuck at the harbor.

30501022.name: Manjuu Logistics
30501022.description: Cargo distribution has been delayed, and the goods slated to be delivered all over the island are now stuck at the harbor.

30501031.name: Manjuu Logistics
30501031.description: Cargo distribution has been delayed, and the goods slated to be delivered all over the island are now stuck at the harbor.

30501032.name: Manjuu Logistics
30501032.description: Cargo distribution has been delayed, and the goods slated to be delivered all over the island are now stuck at the harbor.

30502001.name: Delivery Service
30502001.description: Am-Mer-Mar has started a new food delivery service. Help her get food out to hungry customers.

30502002.name: Delivery Service
30502002.description: Am-Mer-Mar has started a new food delivery service. Help her get food out to hungry customers.

30502011.name: Delivery Service
30502011.description: Am-Mer-Mar has started a new food delivery service. Help her get food out to hungry customers.

30502012.name: Delivery Service
30502012.description: Am-Mer-Mar has started a new food delivery service. Help her get food out to hungry customers.

30502021.name: Delivery Service
30502021.description: Am-Mer-Mar has started a new food delivery service. Help her get food out to hungry customers.

30502022.name: Delivery Service
30502022.description: Am-Mer-Mar has started a new food delivery service. Help her get food out to hungry customers.

30502031.name: Delivery Service
30502031.description: Am-Mer-Mar has started a new food delivery service. Help her get food out to hungry customers.

30502032.name: Delivery Service
30502032.description: Am-Mer-Mar has started a new food delivery service. Help her get food out to hungry customers.

30504001.name: Everyone Loves Cats
30504001.description: The cats on the island have been looking down lately. Use your magic touch on the cats to cheer them up!

30505001.name: May This Moment Last Forever!
30505001.description: A new day, a new you.

30508001.name: A Beautiful Day
30508001.description: Kick off a wonderful day with a warm greeting. Go and greet your friends on the island!

30601001.name: Daily Supply
30601001.description: Another new day has arrived. Head over to Get-Together Island to pick up today's shipment of supplies.

30701001.name: Making a Meal
30701001.description: What good is a new restaurant without things to put on the menu? Let's come up with some new recipes!

30702001.name: Smoke From the Stove
30702001.description: Business seems to be popping at the Golden Koi Restaurant. Whip out your spoon and let the rich aroma of food fill the commercial area!

targets.text: Make any Golden Koi Restaurant recipe.

30703001.name: Commercial Area Desserts
30703001.description: Go put together a signature menu and treat everyone in the commercial area to some sublime sweetness!

targets.text: Make any Polar Bear Teahouse recipe.

30704001.name: Small Meals to the Rescue
30704001.description: It's rush hour! Prep some nutritious light meals to fill the islanders' bellies!

30705001.name: Coal-Fired Deliciousness
30705001.description: The coal fire glows a brilliant red - time to treat the people to some delicious smoky food!

30706001.name: Manjuu Time
30706001.description: The customers at Café Manjuu are having a chill time. Brew some fragrant coffee for them!

40101001.name: Growing Stockpiles
40101001.description: The minerals you gathered last time really came in handy! Think you can collect some more, please?

targets.text: Assign a character to produce ore.

40102001.name: Who's Lumbering?
40102001.description: Commander, the trees are still growing out of control... Could you lend a hand again?

targets.text: Assign a character to produce lumber.

40103001.name: Harvest Festa
40103001.description: There are still some fertile fields we can use, so let's think of something else to plant.

targets.text: Assign a character to produce crops.

40104001.name: Nursery's Assisant
40104001.description: Commander, I'm a bit busy right now and could use some help... Could you spare a moment of your time?

targets.text: Assign a character to produce nursery crops.

40105001.name: To Taste the Rainbow
40105001.description: I'd like to liven up the orchard with a wide variety of trees. What do you think would look best?

targets.text: Assign a character to produce orchard crops.

40106001.name: Animals are Friends
40106001.description: The number of animals on the ranch just keeps growing, and Amerigo can't keep up with it all!

targets.text: Assign a character to produce livestock products.

40107001.name: Crafts Production Equipment Inspection
40107001.description: Expanding the development area requires a variety of arts & crafts products. The equipment to make them will deteriorate if neglected for too long!

40108001.name: Industrial Production Equipment Inspection
40108001.description: Expanding the development area requires a variety of industrial products. The equipment to make them will deteriorate if neglected for too long!

40109001.name: Lumber Production Equipment Inspection
40109001.description: Expanding the development area requires a variety of lumber products. The equipment to make them will deteriorate if neglected for too long!

40110001.name: Electronics Production Equipment Inspection
40110001.description: Expanding the development area requires a variety of electronics products. The equipment to make them will deteriorate if neglected for too long!

40201001.name: Combo (Hunger) Breaker
40201001.description: If we can come up with a combination of dishes to sell together, we'll be able to earn more development funds.

40301001.name: Restocking Best Sellers
40301001.description: What good is a commercial area if there's nothing to buy?

40401001.name: Island Impressions
40401001.description: Is there any place that has left a deep impression within you? If so, make sure to go take a picture of it.

40501001.name: Working Hard Every Day
40501001.description: Complete your daily plans, get resources, and speed up the island's development!

40601001.name: Weekly Goals
40601001.description: Earn funds for the island's development and fill up the coffers!

50001001.name: Gather Autumn Specialties (1/7)
50001001.description: It seems there are loads of autumn gatherables around the island. Commander, could you help me get some?

50001002.name: Gather Autumn Specialties (2/7)
50001002.description: It seems there are loads of autumn gatherables around the island. Commander, could you help me get some?

50001003.name: Gather Autumn Specialties (3/7)
50001003.description: It seems there are loads of autumn gatherables around the island. Commander, could you help me get some?

50001004.name: Gather Autumn Specialties (4/7)
50001004.description: It seems there are loads of autumn gatherables around the island. Commander, could you help me get some?

50001005.name: Gather Autumn Specialties (5/7)
50001005.description: It seems there are loads of autumn gatherables around the island. Commander, could you help me get some?

50001006.name: Gather Autumn Specialties (6/7)
50001006.description: It seems there are loads of autumn gatherables around the island. Commander, could you help me get some?

50001007.name: Gather Autumn Specialties (7/7)
50001007.description: It seems there are loads of autumn gatherables around the island. Commander, could you help me get some?

50002001.name: Make Autumn Specialties (1/7)
50002001.description: These autumn specialties seem like they'd generate good economic value. Commander, for the sake of the island's development, please procure some!

50002002.name: Make Autumn Specialties (2/7)
50002002.description: These autumn specialties seem like they'd generate good economic value. Commander, for the sake of the island's development, please procure some!

50002003.name: Make Autumn Specialties (3/7)
50002003.description: These autumn specialties seem like they'd generate good economic value. Commander, for the sake of the island's development, please procure some!

50002004.name: Make Autumn Specialties (4/7)
50002004.description: These autumn specialties seem like they'd generate good economic value. Commander, for the sake of the island's development, please procure some!

50002005.name: Make Autumn Specialties (5/7)
50002005.description: These autumn specialties seem like they'd generate good economic value. Commander, for the sake of the island's development, please procure some!

50002006.name: Make Autumn Specialties (6/7)
50002006.description: These autumn specialties seem like they'd generate good economic value. Commander, for the sake of the island's development, please procure some!

50002007.name: Make Autumn Specialties (7/7)
50002007.description: These autumn specialties seem like they'd generate good economic value. Commander, for the sake of the island's development, please procure some!

50003001.name: Autumn Specialty Order (1/4)
50003001.description: I'll put the autumn specialties you brought along to good use in the island's construction! Let's keep working steadily at making our development plans come true!

50003002.name: Autumn Specialty Order (2/4)
50003002.description: I'll put the autumn specialties you brought along to good use in the island's construction! Let's keep working steadily at making our development plans come true!

50003003.name: Autumn Specialty Order (3/4)
50003003.description: I'll put the autumn specialties you brought along to good use in the island's construction! Let's keep working steadily at making our development plans come true!

50003004.name: Autumn Specialty Order (4/4)
50003004.description: I'll put the autumn specialties you brought along to good use in the island's construction! Let's keep working steadily at making our development plans come true!

80001001.name: Watching the Fields
80001001.description:
Supply wheat to Island Warehouse to bolster food stores.
Deliver 500 Wheat.

80001002.name: The Beasts Hunger
80001002.description:
Supply fresh grass to the pasture for animal feed.
Deliver 500 Grass.

80001003.name: Beans or Bust
80001003.description:
Supply high-protein soy beans to enrich food processing.
Deliver 500 Soy Beans.

80001004.name: More Rice!
80001004.description:
A stable supply of staple foods is necessary for development.
Deliver 500 Rice.

80001005.name: Golden Granary
80001005.description:
Supply vast cobs of corn to add variety to the islanders' diets.
Deliver 500 Corn.

80001006.name: The Juiciest of Oranges
80001006.description:
Supply carrots to support vitamin intake and health.
Deliver 250 Carrots.

80001007.name: Donations of Dairy
80001007.description:
Supply milk to bolster calcium intake.
Deliver 250 Milk.

80001008.name: Sugar in the Tank
80001008.description:
Supply apple pies to increase development efficiency.
Deliver 250 Apple Pies.

80001009.name: Needs More Coffee
80001009.description:
Feed that addiction and maintain morale with iced coffee.
Deliver 250 Iced Coffee.

80001010.name: Meat Is Energy
80001010.description:
Supply coal-roasted skewers for quick re-energizing.
Deliver 250 Coal-Roasted Skewers.

80001011.name: Basic Seasoning
80001011.description:
Supply onions to enhance the flavors of meals.
Deliver 100 Onions.

80001012.name: A Healthy Menu
80001012.description:
Make vegetable salads for nutritious and delicious meals.
Deliver 100 Vegetable Salads.

80001013.name: Nutritional Combos
80001013.description:
Make tofu with minced meat to meet diverse dietary needs.
Deliver 100 Tofu with Minced Meat.

80001014.name: Latte Time
80001014.description:
Supply lattes to increase morale.
Deliver 100 Lattes.

80001015.name: Stir-Fry Resupply
80001015.description:
Supply stir-fried chicken for tasty and efficient meals.
Deliver 100 Stir-Fried Chicken.

80001016.name: Fast Food
80001016.description:
Energize workers with convenient steak bowls.
Deliver 50 Steak Bowls.

80001017.name: Your First Receipt
80001017.description:
Accept your first daily supplies.
Accept 1 Daily Supply.

80001018.name: Safely Stored
80001018.description:
Fill up that warehouse with three sets of daily supplies.
Accept 5 Daily Supplies.

80001019.name: Regular Resupply
80001019.description:
Build a habit of grabbing your daily goodies.
Accept 10 Daily Supplies.

80001020.name: Efficient Delivery
80001020.description:
Free stuff, easy and efficient!
Accept 20 Daily Supplies.

80001021.name: Space to Spare
80001021.description:
Abundant reserves for a confident settlement!
Accept 30 Daily Supplies.

80001022.name: Sustainable Reserves
80001022.description:
Steady supplies, a vital resource for this island.
Accept 45 Daily Supplies.

80001023.name: Foundation for Development
80001023.description:
Regular accumulation of goods has become the basis of your development.
Accept 60 Daily Supplies.

80001024.name: Your First Request
80001024.description:
You have a basic understanding of requests.
Complete 10 Island Requests.

80001025.name: A Reliable Helper
80001025.description:
You're a consistent fulfiller of requests.
Complete 30 Island Requests.

80001026.name: Firm Support
80001026.description:
This development couldn't function without you!
Complete 50 Island Requests.

80001027.name: Request Master
80001027.description:
You understand people's needs and respond efficiently.
Complete 100 Island Requests.

80001028.name: Pillar of Development
80001028.description:
Your continuous support is the very engine of development.
Complete 150 Island Requests.

80001029.name: Core of Development
80001029.description:
Nobody is more reliable and beloved than you.
Complete 200 Island Requests.

80001030.name: Foundation for Prosperity
80001030.description:
You carry the heavy burden of development and build a prosperous future.
Complete 300 Island Requests.
